wikipedia_page.main: Paul Culpin (born 8 February 1962 in Kirby Muxloe, Leicestershire) is an English former footballer who played as a striker for Nuneaton Borough, Coventry City, Northampton Town, Peterborough United and Hereford United. He also played abroad, representing Grankulla IFK over three different spells in the Finnish First Division.
